scenario_text.value:
We’ve taken out the followers...
All that’s left is Miyuki!

But can we really hurt Miyuki...?
...Shit!

Strange... How did they become so formidable
with the addition of a single sacrifice?

Yet I tire of this resistance. The one who
brought this renewed hope must be crushed!

What’re you doing, Takuma?!
You’re history if you keep this up!

But it’s Miyuki!
There’s no way I can fight her!

Fascinating... Yet so typical of an offering.
Slave to emotion, incapable of judgment.

All that remains now is to finish you off.
Out of the fog, my vanguard!
